description: The Lively Root Easy Care Plant Gift Club is a subscription gift that keeps on giving, quarter after quarter—so your sentiments aren't forgotten. The first installment ships to arrive when you order. Future shipments arrive every 3 months. And best of all, every plant delivery ships for free!

Your favorite plant lover will receive an easy-care plant in a 4" or 6” diameter grow pot (your choice) delivered to their door every quarter. This subscription club is made for a new plant parent, a houseplant pro that’s looking to continue to grow, or someone who just loves surprises and trying new things!
data.title: Great For Gifting - Easy Care Plant Gift Club
